docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: This site shows the capabilities of MkDocs with Material and GitHub Pages for publishing documentation.

docs.title: 1. Create a new project:
docs.text:
mkdocs new [directory_name]

or create in exist project

mkdocs new ./

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

Useful links

  • Official documentation MkDocs
  • Material theme
  • Github pages deploy action
